metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7798 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Developer Tools feature suffers from a XUL injection vulnerability due to improper sanitization of the web page source code. In the worst case, this could allow arbitrary code execution when opening a malicious page with the style editor tool. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.3 and Firefox < 55.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs38 contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.0.2+build1-0ubuntu4').
